Reviews.Title: i9500 not i9505
Reviews.Author: Abdulrahman
Reviews.Content: with the headline i9500 / i9505 it is assumed that it works as both 3G and 4G LTE but it is an i9500 only so it only works on basic 4G H+ and no LTE. Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: J. Rodriguez Lizardi "Janeth"
Reviews.Content: I love this cellphone. I use to have Blackberry but the experience with Samsung is incredible. Only doubt is I understood this cellphone will be black, but I receive white.

ProductInfo.Name: SAMSUNG GALAXY S4 i9500/ i9505 16GB INTERNATIONAL VERSION-NO WARRANTY
